body: The afterword says this is part 1, and it has relationship with the other elf story (#300524). Well, there's the potion to become elf, and that elf guy looks like the slave hunter who got turned into elf girl. | The protagonist was a knight stationed to guard village. He got assaulted, and his assailant used that potion. Her new name is Atla, and she's sold in auction, only the organized revealed she was a human male, and whoever break her will get her cheap. In the end, a shrouded man won her. In the ending, he's taking her to the elf village. | There's not enough info about why the village was attacked though. Could've just been bandits.

The afterword says this is part 1, and it has relationship with the other elf story (#300524). Well, there's the potion to become elf, and that elf guy looks like the slave hunter who got turned into elf. | The protagonist was a knight stationed to guard village. He got assaulted, and his assailant used that potion. Her new name is Atla, and she's sold in auction, only the organized revealed she was a human male, and whoever break her will get her cheap. In the end, a shrouded man won her. Although, the talk seems to imply the elf man is probably the person putting her in auction, because they ask why do that when he could have fetched higher price, but he said there are fun you can't just buy with money. In the ending, he's taking her to the elf village.
